emerging_tracks.name: Data Science
emerging_tracks.description: Learn how to analyze data sets to discover insights about the world.

emerging_tracks.name: iOS Development
emerging_tracks.description: Interested in one day publishing an app on Apple PlayStore? Start your journey with the basics of iOS development.

emerging_tracks.name: Video Games
emerging_tracks.description: Learn more about the process that goes into video games and the tools used to make them.

emerging_tracks.name: Web Development
emerging_tracks.description: Learn the basics of how to make interactive websites.

emerging_tracks.name: UX Design
emerging_tracks.description: Explore the fundamentals of user interface/user experience (UI/UX) design from user research to beautiful mockups and prototypes.
